text: 两位二十多岁的韩国女性，拥有如K-Pop偶像般精致的面容，站在海滩上。 她们身穿比基尼，手戴拳击手套，在沙滩上展开对决。 这一场景依然带有K-Pop音乐视频风格，将现代的轻松与日常生活元素结合，创造出一种充满视觉冲击力的艺术感。 阳光明媚的沙滩背景为场景增添了一种独特的氛围，海风轻拂，背景中隐约可见波浪。
trans: Two Korean women in their twenties, with faces as refined as K-Pop idols, stand on a beach. They wear bikinis and boxing gloves, engaging in a duel on the sand. The scene retains the style of a K-Pop music video, blending modern casual elements with everyday life to create a visually impactful artistic sense. The sunny beach background adds a unique atmosphere to the scene, with sea breezes blowing gently and waves faintly visible in the background.
